body:
Comment 1: 
The gotest program is a simple shell script.  Without rewriting it as a tool that
actually parses Go source code, it is not possible to avoid all possible such bugs. 
Consider

/*
package x
*/
package y

Since it's very easy to change your source code to avoid the confusion, I suggest doing
that for now.  One day gotest may be rewritten but it serves well enough for now that,
with regret, I will retire this issue.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
